textInfo: To receive online payments, you must fill in all the information below.
textAddress: Please check and update your complete address if needed (number, street name, etc.) and not only your place of residence.
textAddressDetails: The following fields will be filled in thanks to the search above. Please check the information matches.

errors.iban: The IBAN number must be valid
errors.streetRequired: The number and the street are mandatory

modalSuppr.title: Delete the bank details?
modalSuppr.line1: Your bank details will be deleted.
modalSuppr.line2: You will no longer be able to receive electronic payments.

bank-account.create: Les coordonnées bancaires ont bien été enregistrées et votre adresse de résidence mise à jour.
